name: demotivation.me - Без рекламы ТЕМНЫЙ ФОН
description:
Темный фон для комфортного чтения ночью.
Реклама убрана + мелкие улучшения стилясайта.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("demotivation.me")
{
  
  *
   {
     color: #999999 !important; 
     border-color: #999999 !important;
     outline-color: #999999 !important;
     text-shadow: none !important;
     background-color: #000000 !important;
   }

table, tr, td {border: 0px !important;}
a {text-decoration: none !important;}
a[href*="radyx.ru"],
a[href*="apachan.net"],
a[href*="sramu.net"],
[src*="mbe.ru"],
IMG[src*="/banners/"],
#like_body,
#vk_like,
.mctable3050,
#DIV_DA_45138,
#n4p_2534, #n4p_2536, #n4p_2535,
IMG[src="/radar.gif"],
#MarketGidComposite4769,
#MarketGidComposite4933,
#MarketGidComposite4932,
IMG[title="LiveInternet: number of pageviews for 24 hours, of visitors for 24 hours and for today is shown"],
DIV[style="position:fixed;top:0px;left:0px;width:100%;background-color:white;padding:5px;z-index:10;"],
.liketext,
.connect_button_container,
#LikePluginPagelet,
#rt-videoinf__image,
.connect_widget_interactive_area,
.connect_widget_like_button.clearfix.like_button_no_like,
.mcteaser9843, .mctitle3050, .MGC030503050, .PC_Links_Block, .MGC049329954, .mcteaser9955,
#PC_Links_Block_16250,
#adv_7bcdf75ad237b8e02e301f4091fb6bc8_baloon_wrap,
#adv_091d584fced301b442654dd8c23b3fc9_wrapper,
#add2_div,
#am_sb_panel,
#adf_notifiers_wrap,
#a96ea64f3a_notifiers_wrap,
#amfr1,
A[href="http://radarurl.com/monitor"],
DIV[style="position:fixed;top:0px;left:0px;width:100%;background-color:white;padding:5px;z-index:10;"],
DIV[style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px solid transparent; display: block; width: 227px; height: 280px;"],
#mg_overlay_holder_ad,
#mg_overlay_div,
.mcteaser9956, object, #viboom34,
.rt-videoinf, .rt-videoinf__outer, #rt-videoinf,
DIV[style="font-family:verdana;font-weight:bold;font-size:12px;"]
{display: none !important;}
}
